original: @129a * // thugs rje chen po rgyal ba lnga la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @129a * // thugs rje chen po rgyal ba lnga la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the five victorious ones of great compassion.

original: shin tu rnam dag dang ba'i mtshor //
analyzed: shin tu rnam dag dang ba'i mtshor //
translated: In the lake of the most pure and clear,

original: rab mdzes sdong bu lnga ldan steng //
analyzed: rab mdzes sdong bu lnga ldan steng //
translated: on top of the five-petaled lotus of great beauty,

original: rnam snang rdo rje sems dpa' dang // rin 'byung 'od dpag med don grub //
analyzed: rnam snang rdo rje sems dpa' dang // rin 'byung 'od dpag med don grub //
translated: Vairocana, Vajrasattva, Ratnasa·πÉbhava, AmitƒÅbha, Amoghasiddhi,

original: lnga rig rnam dag sna tshogs gzugs //
analyzed: lnga rig rnam dag sna tshogs gzugs //
translated: the five pristine awarenesses, the various forms of complete purity,

original: dngos gcig rgyal ba lnga la 'dud //
analyzed: dngos gcig rgyal ba lnga la 'dud //
translated: I bow to the one reality, the five victorious ones.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i pa'i spyod pa khyad par can la gnas pas snying rje chen po mdun du byas la //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i pa'i spyod pa khyad par can la gnas pas snying rje chen po mdun du byas la //
translated: One who abides in the distinctive conduct of a bodhisattva, with great compassion at the forefront,

original: thog ma kho nar chod thams cad stong pa nyid du rab tu bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: thog ma kho nar chod thams cad stong pa nyid du rab tu bsgom par bya'o //
translated: should first meditate on all phenomena as emptiness.

original: gdong nas ma skyes 'od gsal ba //
analyzed: gdong nas ma skyes 'od gsal ba //
translated: From the beginning, not born, luminous,

original: gang shar nyid na ngo bo med //
analyzed: gang shar nyid na ngo bo med //
translated: whatever arises is itself without essence.

original: chos rnams kun gyis mtshan nyid de //
analyzed: chos rnams kun gyis mtshan nyid de //
translated: This is the characteristic of all phenomena,

original: bla ma'i drin gyis rtogs par 'gyur //
analyzed: bla ma'i drin gyis rtogs par 'gyur //
translated: which will be realized through the kindness of the guru.

original: gang 'di ltar ngo bo med pa'i chos 'di dag ni zab pa'i phyir rtogs dka' bas mi shes pa'i 'gro ba lnga po ni nges par sdug bsngal ba'o zhes brtags nas dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje chen pos rlung gi dkyil 'khor mngon par bskyod pas /
analyzed: gang 'di ltar ngo bo med pa'i chos 'di dag ni zab pa'i phyir rtogs dka' bas mi shes pa'i 'gro ba lnga po ni nges par sdug bsngal ba'o zhes brtags nas dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje chen pos rlung gi dkyil 'khor mngon par bskyod pas /
translated: Having examined that these phenomena, which are thus without an essence, are difficult to realize because of their profundity, and that the five classes of migrating beings are definitely suffering because of their lack of understanding, [the buddhas] stir the ma·πá·∏çala of wind with great, nonconceptual compassion.

original: skye bo nyon mongs sgrib tshogs sprin gyi phung po shin tu mthug bo gtibs gyur la //
analyzed: skye bo nyon mongs sgrib tshogs sprin gyi phung po shin tu mthug bo gtibs gyur la //
translated: The mass of clouds of the afflictions and obscurations of beings

original: tsham tshom med par drag po'i shugs kyis kun du rab tu dral zhing yongs su gtor //
analyzed: tsham tshom med par drag po'i shugs kyis kun du rab tu dral zhing yongs su gtor //
translated: are completely rent and scattered by the force of the powerful one.

original: de yi thabs gyur thugs rje'i dbyings kyi sna tshogs mdzad pas dbyer med cig car bsgrub pa yi //
analyzed: de yi thabs gyur thugs rje'i dbyings kyi sna tshogs mdzad pas dbyer med cig car bsgrub pa yi //
translated: The method for that is the simultaneous accomplishment of the indivisible various deeds of the dhƒÅtu of compassion.

original: mgon po dam pa rigs kyi lha lnga bsgrub cing stobs lnga sogs //
analyzed: mgon po dam pa rigs kyi lha lnga bsgrub cing stobs lnga sogs //
translated: The five families of the sublime lord are accomplished, and the five powers, and so on,üîΩare accomplished in the five places.

original: de la dbus sogs sdong 'dab bcas //üîΩzla ba'i 'khor lo gsal ba la //
analyzed: de la dbus sogs sdong 'dab bcas // zla ba'i 'khor lo gsal ba la //
translated: The branches of the trunk, and so on, are in the center.üîΩThe five seed syllables are visualized in the clear ma·πá·∏çala of the moon

original: me long gzugs ltar 'bru lnga bsam / phrin las sbyar skur bskyed do //
analyzed: me long gzugs ltar 'bru lnga bsam / phrin las sbyar skur bskyed do //
translated: like a form in a mirror.

original: rnam par snang mdzad ni kha ba'i mdog can ji skad 'byung ba'i phyag rgya can hr'i:'i snying po can 'khor los mtshan @129b pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad ni kha ba'i mdog can ji skad 'byung ba'i phyag rgya can hr'i:'i snying po can 'khor los mtshan @129b pa'o //
translated: Vairocana is the color of snow, has the previously mentioned mudra, has the essence of hri, and is marked with a wheel.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' ni nam mkha'i mdog can ji skad 'byung ba'i phyag rgya can h'um gi snying po can rdo rjes mtshan pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' ni nam mkha'i mdog can ji skad 'byung ba'i phyag rgya can h'um gi snying po can rdo rjes mtshan pa'o //
translated: Vajrasattva is the color of the sky, has the previously mentioned mudra, has the essence of hum, and is marked with a vajra.

original: rin chen 'byung ldan ni gser btso ma'i mdog can ji skad 'byung ba'i phyag rgya can tr'am gi snying po can rin po ches mtshan pa'o //üîΩ'od dpag med ni me lce 'bar ba'i mdog can ji skad 'byung ba'i phyag rgya can hr'i:'i snying po can padmos mtshan pa'o //
analyzed: rin chen 'byung ldan ni gser btso ma'i mdog can ji skad 'byung ba'i phyag rgya can tr'am gi snying po can rin po ches mtshan pa'o // 'od dpag med ni me lce 'bar ba'i mdog can ji skad 'byung ba'i phyag rgya can hr'i:'i snying po can padmos mtshan pa'o //
translated: Ratnasa·πÉbhava is the color of refined gold, has the previously mentioned mudra, has the essence of tram, and is marked with a jewel.üîΩAmitƒÅbha is the color of a blazing flame, has the previously mentioned mudra, has the essence of hri, and is marked with a lotus.

original: don yod grub pa s'a lu ljang ba'i mdog can ji skad 'byung ba'i phyag rgya can aa:'i snying po can ral gris mtshan pa'o //
analyzed: don yod grub pa s'a lu ljang ba'i mdog can ji skad 'byung ba'i phyag rgya can aa:'i snying po can ral gris mtshan pa'o //
translated: Amoghasiddhi is the color of green barley, has the previously mentioned mudra, has the essence of a·∏•, and is marked with a sword.

original: 'di dag dbus bcas phyogs rnams su //
analyzed: 'di dag dbus bcas phyogs rnams su //
translated: These are in the center and the directions,

original: rim bzhin las lnga mdzad pa la //
analyzed: rim bzhin las lnga mdzad pa la //
translated: performing the five activities in sequence.

original: brtson pas ting nge 'dzin bzhengs pa //
analyzed: brtson pas ting nge 'dzin bzhengs pa //
translated: and through diligence, one generates samadhi.

original: bdag sbyang ba dang gzhan sbyang ba gnyis /
analyzed: bdag sbyang ba dang gzhan sbyang ba gnyis /
translated: There are two parts to this: purifying oneself and purifying others.

original: aom a'a sva p'a r'artha dzny'a na sva bh'a ba shuddha pra k'a sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom a'a sva p'a r'artha dzny'a na sva bh'a ba shuddha pra k'a sv'a h'a /
translated: Om asva-partha-jnana-svabhava-sudha-prapasva ha.

original: 'khor lo lta bu'i sngags so //
analyzed: 'khor lo lta bu'i sngags so //
translated: This is the mantra of the wheel.

original: thugs rje chen po lha lnga'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
analyzed: thugs rje chen po lha lnga'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
translated: The sadhana of the five deities of Mahakarunika is complete.
